event.name: “Transformative Media Pedagogies” Book Launch Event
event.shortDescription: Join us on February 16th via zoom at 11am to celebrate the launch of “Transformative Media Pedagogies” and chat with the authors.

description.html:
We are proud to present the “Transformative Media Pedagogies” book launch event on February 16th at 11am. This book is edited by our amazing faculty members Paul Mihailidis and Megan Fromm. Transforming Media Pedagogies explores the concept of individual and collective transformation as the underlying driver for media pedagogy. The book also offers valuable insights and practical strategies for implementing transformative media pedagogies.

Featuring contributing authors and editors: Sanjeev Chatterjee, Karen Fowler Watt, Roman Gerodimos, Eric Gordon, Chris Harris, Henry Jenkins, Claudia Kozman, Stephen Reese, Carol Reese, Stephen Salyer, Pablo Martinez-Zarate.
